name: edition_id
description: Joins to the `id` column of the `publishing_api.editions` table, and its derivatives

name: attachment_index
description: Ordinal position of the attachment in the `details` column of its parent edition

name: assets
description: Array of assets of an attachment. Often there are two assets: a document, and its thumbnail with a filename that is prefixed with 'thumbnail_'.

fields.name: asset_index
fields.description: Ordinal position of the asset in its parent attachment.

fields.name: asset_manager_id
fields.description: Joins to the `_id` column of the asset_manager.assets table
